name: aileen
cooked: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. This thread is devoted to question # 10, which reads: “Is reaching out to companies outside of the current open source hardware community a goal worth pursuing?” For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
raw: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. This thread is devoted to question # 10, which reads: "Is reaching out to companies outside of the current open source hardware community a goal worth pursuing?" For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
